nodes.text: The Dentamma Nebula was located in the Varada sector of the Outer Rim Territories. At some point by 3 ABY, Archduke Monio of the Dentamma Nebula bet the ownership of the entire Unnipar system in a high-stakes sabacc game. The Teltior con artist Ceezva, who had bluffed her way into the game, managed to win the star system from Monio.

The Dentamma Nebula was first mentioned in the 1993 Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Three, written by John Terra. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the nebula in grid square I-19.
